Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of each screen space ambient occlusion quality level.

enabled.Wiki: If ON, enable screen-space ambient occlusion.

cs_reprojEnabledType.Wiki: If reprojection is enabled, artifacts are hidden from undersampling, but ghosting may occur if reprojection fails.

cs_upScaleEnabledType.Wiki: Determines the bilateral upscaling settings for SSAO.

cs_useNormalEnabledType.Wiki: Determines the normal usage settings for SSAO.
